medical_history.chief_complaint: Generalized weakness, malaise, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks prior to admission with generalized weakness and malaise, worsening to vomiting and diarrhea for 1 week. The patient reported extreme exhaustion, being unable to walk to the bathroom one day prior to admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic hypercholesterolemia, benign prostatic hyperplasia, hypertension, benign fatty liver, esophageal reflux, sleep apnea, alcoholism, uncontrolled type 2 diabetes mellitus.
medical_history.family_history: Father passed away of bladder cancer.
